name: Dire Troll
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Keen Senses: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell or sight.
traits.Regeneration: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, it regains only 5 hit points at the start of its next turn. The troll dies only if it is hit by an attack that deals 10 or more acid or fire damage while the troll has 0 hit points.

actions.Multiattack: The troll makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +11+1d10 + 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +11+1d10 + 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) slashing damage.
actions.Whirlwind of Claws (Recharge 5xe2x80x936: Each creature within 10 feet of the troll must make a DC 19+1d10 + 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
